pr_title: Fixed issue #1650 in Participant Manager, User Management and User Enrollment Service

timeline.bodyText:
[user-mgmt Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Line is longer than 100 characters (found 124).
timeline.author: github-actions
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -295,10 +296,11 @@ public void deactivateAcct(String userId, List<String> deleteData, String userDe

           .createSQLQuery(
-              "UPDATE participant_registry_site SET onboarding_status=:onboardingStatus WHERE "
+              "UPDATE participant_registry_site SET onboarding_status=:onboardingStatus, disabled_time=:disabledDate WHERE "

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/participant-datastore/user-mgmt-module/user-mgmt/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/dao/UserProfileManagementDaoImpl.java b/participant-datastore/user-mgmt-module/user-mgmt/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/dao/UserProfileManagementDaoImpl.java
index 728190e4b..276604d42 100644
--- a/participant-datastore/user-mgmt-module/user-mgmt/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/dao/UserProfileManagementDaoImpl.java
+++ b/participant-datastore/user-mgmt-module/user-mgmt/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/dao/UserProfileManagementDaoImpl.java

@@ -296,7 +296,8 @@ public class UserProfileManagementDaoImpl implements UserProfileManagementDao {
 
       session
           .createSQLQuery(
-              "UPDATE participant_registry_site SET onboarding_status=:onboardingStatus, disabled_time=:disabledDate WHERE "
+              "UPDATE participant_registry_site SET onboarding_status=:onboardingStatus, "
+                  + "disabled_time=:disabledDate WHERE "
                   + "id IN (SELECT participant_registry_site_id FROM participant_study_info where "
                   + "user_details_id=:userDetailsId and study_info_id IN (:studyIds))")
           .setParameter("onboardingStatus", OnboardingStatus.DISABLED.getCode())
